item.description:
Revolve Nation is proud to provide you with access to another great speaker!! Revolve Nation and the Babson Alumni Entrepreneurship Forum are pleased to present:

Need Financing?

Learn What It Really Takes to Get Angel and VC Funding


**NOTE: There is a two-step registration process for this event - see below.**


Keynote Speaker:


Trish Costello


Director, Arthur M. Blank Center for Entrepreneurship


Wednesday, October 8, 2008


5:45 pm - 8:30 pm


Babson College, Blank Center, Televideo Conference Room


Are you in need of design capital, execution capital or expansion capital? Join the Babson community and fellow entrepreneurs to learn what it really takes to get funded.

Trish Costello's professional background includes entrepreneurial, corporate, non-profit and academic experience. She was on the start-up team of the Kauffman Foundation's entrepreneurship center, where she directed its efforts in venture capital, angel investing, entrepreneur support programs, and programming to accelerate high potential women entrepreneurs. She continues to serve as President of CVE Capital Corp., a holding company affiliated with a $250 million VC fund created to endow the Kauffman Fellows Program.


Schedule



5:45 pm - 6:45 pm Registration & Networking


6:45 pm - 7:45 pm Keynote Address and Q & A


7:45 pm Additional Networking


Co-hosted by Revolve Nation and the Babson Alumni Entrepreneurship Forum.

There is a $15 per person fee to attend this event.

To register you must RSVP "yes" on meetup, AND you must register with Babson by clicking HERE.
item.name: Need Financing? Learn What It Really Takes to Get Angel and VC Funding
